General.Name: Platina Resources Limited
General.Description: Platina Resources Limited acquires, explores for, and develops mineral deposits in Australia, the United States, and Greenland. It explores for platinum group metals, zinc and gold, and base metals. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Mount Hawthorn, Australia.
General.Address: 389 Oxford Street, Mount Hawthorn, WA, Australia, 6016
